pos_mean_info_list.mean: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的

word_group.brief_definition: 根深蒂固的；深深植根；顽固地存在
肌肉十分发达的；肌肉结实
强烈的警告；措辞强烈的警告

bilingual.target: 今天的风正在强烈地阵风。
这香水强烈地散发着玫瑰的香味。

bilingual.source: The evidence strongly suggests that he is innocent.
bilingual.target: 证据强烈地表明他是无辜的。

bilingual.source: She strongly believes in the importance of education.
bilingual.target: 她强烈地相信教育的重要性。

bilingual.source: He strongly recommended that we try the new restaurant.
bilingual.target: 他强烈地推荐我们尝试那家新餐馆。

bilingual.source: The community strongly opposed the new construction project.
bilingual.target: 社区强烈地反对新的建设项目。

bilingual.source: I believe in that definition very strongly .
bilingual.target: 我非常强烈地相信那个定义。

bilingual.source: I strongly disagree with this outdated notion.
bilingual.target: 我很强烈地反对这种过时的观点。

bilingual.source: This is, I would strongly suggest, simply not true.
bilingual.target: 这时，我会强烈地提出，这完全是不真实的。

bilingual.source: But the king's advisors strongly opposed these initiatives.
bilingual.target: 然而国王的顾问却强烈地反对这些措施。

yingyinNormal.en: And I strongly believe, it's not the technology that changed the world. It's the dreams behind the technology that changed the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我强烈地相信，不是科技改变了世界，是科技背后的梦想改变了世界。

yingyinNormal.en: I was strongly against that decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时强烈反对那个决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe the internal revenue service would strongly disagree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信国税局会强烈反对。

yingyinNormal.en: If he felt so strongly, he should've have advised you otherwise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他这么反对，他就应该劝阻你。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, where do you stand on it? Where do you stand on it? Strongly pro.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你是同意还是反对呢？你同意吗？非常同意。

yingyinNormal.en: Waves are more strongly felt when a boat turns sideways to the current.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当船侧对着海浪时，晕船会更加强烈。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything at all that you guys believe in so strongly you'd fight for it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但必须是你们深深相信并愿意为之抗争的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, do you care about friendship? I feel really strongly about this, Rachel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你在乎我们的友谊吗？我对这个真的很反感。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, Pete and I here feel very strongly that we stay on the track we've chosen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，皮特和我坚信我们当初的想法。

yingyinNormal.en: The ties that will bind you yet more tenderly and strongly to the home you so adorn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那关系将会更加温情而有力地把你跟你悉心经营的家连结在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Get your house in order, Bernard. And if there is a problem, I strongly suggest you tell me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 管好你的部门，伯纳德，如果有问题，我强烈建议你告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not trying to start a war. I just think it's okay to feel strongly about what you believe in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才没想挑起什么战争，我只是觉得坚信自己的想法也是可以的。

yingyinNormal.en: She seemed most concerned with the new narrative. She felt strongly that it would be best to delay it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她好像很担心新故事线，她觉得最好能推迟上线。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know about you, but I intend to write a strongly worded letter to the White Star Line about all this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道你是怎么想的，但我准备写封抗议信给白星轮船公司。

yingyinNormal.en: What is the problem? Where is the missing part? So I think I strongly believe that the missing part is in Europe. What is that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题在哪里？缺了什么？我坚定地相信，缺的那部分，能够在欧洲找到。是什么?

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe we should call her. I would strongly advice against doing that. Just let me take care of it from my end, and avoid the complication.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我们应该给她打个电话。我坚决反对这么做，让我自己来处理吧，别搞得太复杂了。

yingyinNormal.en: Because she's shy! Bingley too, is modest and was persuaded she didn't feel strongly for him. Because you suggested it. I did it for his own good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是因为她害羞！彬格莱被说服了，她的感觉并不强列。是你说的。我这样做是为了他好。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, this is your enterprise, so it's ultimately your decision, but based on the quality of his work, I'd strongly recommend that we let Leonard go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，这是你的公司，所以最终决议权在于你，但基于他工作的质量，我强烈建议开除莱纳德。

yingyinNormal.en: And I was to try to convince them all alone, the best thing to do was not to pull strongly on the bandages and make them very fast but was to do it slower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我试图使他们相信最好的办法，不是使劲快速拉扯下，而是慢慢解开。

yingyinNormal.en: So if you don't want to be in the papers, I would strongly suggest that you use your considerable influence with the NSA to take us off any lists that we are on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以如果你不想出现在报纸上的话，我强烈建议你利用你在国家安全局的重要影响力把我们从任何监听名单上剔除。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to a great degree or extent

examination_example.sentence: Their ratings correlated <highlight>strongly</highlight> with students' end-of-semester ratings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的评分与学生的期末评分密切相关。

examination_example.sentence: Another factor may be that more people are trying to overpack their carry-on bags to avoid checked-baggage fees, though the airlines <highlight>strongly</highlight> dispute this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个因素可能是，很多人为了避免行李托运费，设法将随身行李塞得满满的，不过，航空公司强烈反对这种行为。

sense_info_list.en: in a very intense or distinctive manner

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to a great degree or extent

examination_example.sentence: Occupation and socio-economic status were the most <highlight>strongly</highlight> correlated, suggesting that our values are more economically driven than we usually think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业和社会经济状况的关联性最强，这表明我们的价值观比我们通常认为的更受经济驱动。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>strongly</highlight> intend to continue this dialogue, including talks with Greenpeace, to discuss improvements based on the latest scientific data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们强烈希望继续这一对话，包括与绿色和平组织的对话，讨论基于最新科学数据上的改进。

sense_info_list.en: in a very intense or distinctive manner

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 加强；巩固；使坚强；变强
n. 力；力量；实力；强点；强项；长处；人数；强度
adv. 强有力地；坚强地；强烈地；气味浓地

word_family.mean: adj. 强劲的；强有力的；强壮的；强固的；牢固的；坚牢的；浓烈的；浓重的；强变化的；强变格的

sense_info_list.en: in a very intense or distinctive manner

examination_example.sentence: How tall we are now is <highlight>strongly</highlight> influenced by the environment we grew up in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在的身高很大程度上受我们成长环境的影响。

examination_example.sentence: I definitely feel things more <highlight>strongly</highlight> than the average person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的感觉肯定比一般人更强烈。

examination_example.sentence: Ancient philosophers <highlight>strongly</highlight> advise that we do good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古代哲学家强烈建议我们行善。

sense_info_list.en: very much or in a very serious way

examination_example.sentence: "Thus body weight is <highlight>strongly</highlight> influenced by biology—it is not an individual's fault if they develop obesity."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “因此，体重受到生物学的强烈影响——如果他们变得肥胖，这不是个人的错。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to a great degree or extent

examination_example.sentence: Players from both countries believed <highlight>strongly</highlight> in the idea of friendship first, competition second.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两国的选手都坚信友谊第一，比赛第二的理念。

examination_example.sentence: And it makes them <highlight>strongly</highlight> believe that they would go beyond (在另一边) the mountains one day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使他们坚信，有一天他们会在另一边的山脉。

examination_example.sentence: Zhang Ting, the mother of a fourth grader in Beijing, said she <highlight>strongly</highlight> supported the ban.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北京一名四年级学生的母亲张婷说，她强烈支持这项禁令。
